attributes.title: NOW I NEED THERAPY!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app with high hopes, but Trump never ceases to disappoint me. The downloading time took a tad bit longer than expected, about 86 weeks. I had already started to lose interest in the app by now, but I continued because God bless America. As soon as I signed in, it asked if I would like to turn my location services on, so I did just that. Immediately after, I heard a knock at my door and the Men In Black starring Will Smith were on my porch ready to take me away. Being a Gen Z, I didnâ€™t give up without a fight. I knew Pawn Starsâ€™ Rick Harrison would know a guy who could help me out so I gave Rick a call. He then made a call to a buddy of his, and we got the situation taken care of. I knew I could count on Rick. Anyways, this app was a complete waste of my time, and it also put me in harmâ€™s way. I have frequent flashbacks of this incident and I now have a therapist appointment every 3 hours for the next 2 years. DONâ€™T DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.title: made my messages crash
attributes.review: i down loaded this app because i wanted to keep up with politics and candidates for 2020, when i put my number in the first place to put your number, i was expecting only a code to be able to log me in, not make my messages crash and share my number with other trump organization numbers and more trump owned businesses. i have gotten nine texts only in the past five days, i wanted to stay updated on trumps plans, though i am not a supporter; it completely crashed my messages and i had to delete and re-download the app to be able to make this review. my messages wouldn't send, it wouldn't show whom they were from, and i got spam from this app. i do not recommend this app if you are wanting to keep up with trump, keep up through other sources just not this one.

attributes.title: App crashes phone
attributes.review: Okay, all TikTok jokes aside, this app crashed my phone every time I tried to open it. In addition, this app is not user friendly and is hard to navigate. When I first downloaded the app, I thought it would have useful statistics and information in order to help me make an informed voting decision. I am a voter who cares about getting to know all sides of the political spectrum, so I also downloaded the Biden 2020 and Yang 2020 apps. Yangâ€™s blows this app out of the water. Truly, I wish I never wasted a full day waiting for this to download. The worst part is that after waiting so long, I discovered that this app truly is only in support of Trump, so that was a real bummer. 0/10 would not recommend, the app or the candidate. ğŸ‘ğŸ‘
